original_text: When Joseph woke up, he did what the angel of the Lord had commanded him and took Mary home as his wife.
korean_text: 요셉이 잠에서 깨어 일어나 주의 사자의 분부대로 행하여 그의 아내를 데려왔으나

sentences.original_text: he did what the angel of the Lord had commanded him
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 주의 천사가 명령한 것을 행했습니다

sentences.original_text: and took Mary home as his wife.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 마리아를 아내로 맞아 집으로 데려갔습니다.
